```{r warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
set.seed(1) # for reproducibility

t_max <- 10 
t <- 0 

lmbda <- 10

X <- numeric(0) # vector of t

while(t <= t_max){
  u       <- runif(1)
  t       <-  t - log(u)/lmbda                # t ~ exp(1/lambda)
  if(t < t_max) {
    X <- c(X,t)                               # update index 
  }
}
```

```{r}
length(X)
```

```{r}
df_HPP = tibble(
  x = X, 
  y = 0:(length(X) - 1)
)

p_HPP <- ggplot(data=df_HPP, mapping=aes(x=x, y=y)) +
  geom_step() + 
  labs(title = "Homogeneous Poisson Process lambda(t) = t", 
       x = "t", 
       y = "N(t)")
p_HPP
```
